Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.model

Class ImmutableValuation

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.core.model.Valuation
hu.bme.mit.theta.core.model.ImmutableValuation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Substitution
public final class ImmutableValuation extends Valuation
Basic, immutable implementation of a valuation. The inner builder class can be used to create a new instance.
